amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Cold storage plants; operation and extension; tax.
amendatorysection.para: The city council or village board of trustees shall levy annually a sufficient tax to maintain, operate, and extend any cold storage or refrigeration plant as provided under section 17-956 and to provide for the payment of the interest on, and principal of, any bonds that may have been issued as provided in section 17-957.
